structure.unit: B ADMISSION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY

text.section: The unwarranted admission of any person under the provisions of this chapter; or

The denial of any person of any of the rights accorded to him under the provisions of this chapter shall be punished by a fine not exceeding five thousand dollars ($5,000) or imprisonment for a term not to exceed five (5) years or both.
Any person who violates the confidentiality of any mental health record under the provisions of this chapter shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor.

law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 34, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 328, sec. 9.
